getTotalOriginalPosts() - Method in class socialmedia.BadSocialMedia
 
getTotalOriginalPosts() - Method in interface socialmedia.SocialMediaPlatform
This method returns the current total number of original posts (i.e., disregarding endorsements and comments) present in the platform.
